targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("queries")) FROM "mongodb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "host" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mongodb" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: DB
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mongodb_db_stats" WITH KEY = "db_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.name: Collection
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mongodb_col_stats" WITH KEY = "collection" WHERE "db_name" =~ /^$DB$/
